title: Setting Sail for Smooth Journeys: How Setur's Azure Open AI Chatbot Transforms Travel
executive_summary: Buckle up for a travel revolution! Setur, the renowned Turkish tourism giant, is rewriting the rules of travel planning. With Microsoft Azure OpenAI, Setur has landed a new conversational chatbot that's changing the way we explore the world. By harnessing Microsoft Azure OpenAI, Setur has introduced a conversational chatbot that revolutionizes travel planning, offering unparalleled personalization. This innovative solution caters to Setur's 60,000 daily users, providing instant, customized responses in multiple languages, all powered by AI intelligence.
products: Azure

title: When everyone speaks the same language: Boehringer Ingelheim speeds up knowledge sharing with Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: How can expert knowledge be used efficiently? Typically, someone comes up with a question and searches until they’ve found their answer. In the pharmaceutical industry, coming up with the answer quickly can save many lives. Companies in this industry store their expert knowledge in numerous internal repositories and databases as well as drawing on external sources. Trawling through these stores of information to gain insights for researching, developing, and providing medications could be extremely time-consuming. Now, with the combination of its iQNow platform and Azure OpenAI Service, Boehringer Ingelheim has made it possible for researchers to access information many times faster than before, leaving them with more time and capacity to develop drugs.
products: Azure, Microsoft Entra ID, Word, SharePoint

title: Aster Insights transforms the world’s largest observational research study in oncology with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Aster Insights, a leading provider of scientific intelligence for oncology research, migrated its extensive information pipelines to Microsoft Azure. The migration harmonized dispersed data and helped the company harness advanced analytics to quickly deliver new insights from its multi-petabyte, multi-modal data set. The company used other Microsoft solutions in parallel to streamline financial management and enhance collaboration, security, and compliance. This digital transformation, achieved with no disruption to business operations, reduced manual work on some processes by 90 percent and helped Aster Insights modernize and upgrade its cybersecurity posture. It will also save on storage and computing costs compared to prior systems.
products: Azure, Azure Batch, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse Analytics, Dynamics 365, Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Sentinel, Power BI

title: Mining leader South32 builds an SAP cloud future by boosting data efficiency and performance with Azure
executive_summary: When global mining and metals company South32 demerged from BHP in 2015, it inherited a complex enterprise software environment with consolidation and efficiency challenges facing its large, business-critical SAP estate. The legacy on-premises datacenter did not perform to standard, resulting in outages to the business at critical times of the year. Together with Microsoft, SAP, and infrastructure partner TCS, South32 set a goal of transitioning its more than 100 terabyte data landscape into a fit-for-purpose enterprise resource planning (ERP) system. This was achieved through an SAP on Microsoft Azure transformation, including storage on 20 E-series Azure virtual machines equipped with Azure Premium SSD. South32 seamlessly completed phase one of its SAP migration to Azure, achieving consolidation and simplification of its estate. It also reduced its database size by two-thirds while benefitting from streamlined resourcing and noticeable performance gains.
products: Azure, Azure Blob Storage, Azure NetApp Files, Azure Virtual Machines, SAP on Azure

title: CallMiner partners with Microsoft to convert conversations into action with Azure AI Services
executive_summary: Customer service contact centers can carry out thousands of interactions per day. The process of answering calls, responding to chats and emails, understanding customers’ needs and requests, and delivering the desired outcome can be challenging. What’s more, those interactions contain a wealth of valuable insights that have the power to drive meaningful business-performance improvements. From why customers are contacting your organization and how your agents are performing to potential issues such as with your products and services or compliance risks, intelligence from the contact center can help leaders make better decisions to improve efficiency, customer experiences, product innovation, and more. CallMiner’s AI-driven platform empowers organizations to ingest and analyze every conversation that happens in the contact center and beyond to uncover insights, take action, and drive transformational change.
products: Azure, Azure AI Services, Azure AI Speech, Azure Operator Call Protection

title: Modern Requirements revolutionizing product development with Azure DevOps and Azure OpenAI
executive_summary: For companies to meet the needs of their customers and stakeholders, business leaders create a set number of functional and non-functional requirements (Quality of Service). These requirements help product managers and quality assurance employees enhance existing products and develop new ones for their customers. Success hinges on the ability to get everyone on the same page and working toward the same goal. However, without proper tools, this process can seem outdated, slow, and prone to error. There also exists a gap in the common understanding of requirements among stakeholders, especially as requirements evolve over time and changes need to be managed.
products: Azure

title: Mercy lays the foundation for a future of innovation in patient care using Microsoft Azure to unlock insights from data in the cloud
executive_summary: Mercy, one of the largest healthcare systems in the United States, aided its digital transformation by using Microsoft Azure to decrease operational costs, improve the patient experience, and give its providers better access to data. The company wanted to modernize its infrastructure and extract more value from its sizeable data archives to keep up with evolving patient and doctor expectations. With support from Microsoft, Mercy identified business outcomes and undertook a digital transformation to achieve them. On Azure, the company improved efficiency, connected previously siloed data, reduced patient stay durations, and built a foundation for ongoing innovation.
products: Azure, Azure Synapse Analytics

title: Schneider Electric fast-tracks innovation with Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: Schneider Electric may not be a household name, but it’s the innovative force behind many of the technologies we use every day, in energy management and industrial automation. The company provides productivity-enhancing and energy efficiency solutions around the world, in homes, building, datacenters, electrical grids, and in nearly every aspect of industry. AI is nothing new to Schneider—it’s been carefully experimenting with and using the technology for more than three decades. Now that the necessary infrastructure and supporting technologies have matured to the point where AI is within reach of all of us, Schneider is ready with its own AI-enabled solutions. The company is basing its customer-facing AI solutions on a highly performant technology from a vendor it has trusted for years: Azure OpenAI Service, a solution within Microsoft Cloud for Manufacturing.
products: Azure

title: Del Monte Foods improves system uptime by 99.99%, saves 57% on infrastructure, and reduces security risk by 50% with Microsoft solutions
executive_summary: Del Monte Foods Inc. (Del Monte), a large food producer and distributor, embarked on a digital transformation to optimize its infrastructure and improve its security posture. Constrained by its previous cloud infrastructure, which was costly and complex, Del Monte faced high maintenance costs, limited scalability, performance bottlenecks, and challenges deploying continuous security improvements. To realize the benefits of the cloud while enhancing security, the company migrated its primary business operations system to Microsoft Azure and implemented the Microsoft Defender security stack. Since adopting Microsoft solutions, Del Monte has reduced infrastructure costs, increased system uptime by 99.99%, and reduced security risks by 50%.
products: Azure, Azure Migrate, Azure Site Recovery, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Defender for Identity, Microsoft Defender XDR

title: Japanese trading house takes advantage of SAP S/4HANA conversion to move to Azure
executive_summary: Inabata & Co., Ltd. updated its SAP enterprise resource planning solution, engaging IT partner Mitsui Knowledge Industry (MKI) to standardize on SAP Business Suite 4 SAP HANA across the global organization. Inabata also switched from the SAP cloud to Microsoft Azure for its interoperability and reliability and deployed Azure Site Recovery to keep its apps running during planned and unplanned outages. MKI migrated Inabata’s systems with minimal downtime, sparking a new business performing similar migrations.
products: Azure, Azure Site Recovery

title: Collectius improves customer experience and productivity and supports growth through Dynamics 365 and Microsoft Power Pages
executive_summary: As a financial restructuring company, Collectius provides their customers with a fresh start on their finances. With growing demand and new portfolios acquired, Collectius found that their collection platform and system no longer met their needs and vision. They then turned to Microsoft Dynamics 365 to provide the functionalities they needed. This proved to be a crucial decision, as it supported the growth of their business and even paved the way for a new self-service offer.
products: Dynamics 365 AI, Power Apps, Power Pages

title: PwC simplifies data retrieval with intelligent bots built on Power Virtual Agents
executive_summary: PwC, a global network of professional services firms, wanted to offer its teams a more convenient way to search for needed content, like strategy presentations and client-related documents, across its repositories. Using Microsoft Power Virtual Agents and Bot Framework Composer, PwC gives even its non-technical team members the ability to easily interact with chatbots that automate the content searching process, improving the speed and accuracy of their results. These impacts will translate to potential benefits for PwC’s clients, as its team members can quickly offer up relevant information to their queries.
products: Microsoft Teams, Power Automate, Microsoft Copilot Studio, SharePoint

title: Spica International streamlines workforce management with Azure-based app
executive_summary: Headquartered in Slovenia, Spica International provides user-friendly software solutions for workforce management to customers around the world. When the company needed to replace its on-premises app offering with a more scalable, flexible, and secure cloud solution, Spica chose Microsoft Azure for a better way forward. Today, its Azure-hosted Time&Space app is paving the way for clients to better manage workforces of all sizes, while enabling Spica to onboard tenfold the number of new clients each month.
products: Azure, Azure Marketplace, Dynamics 365, Power BI

title: Air Astana slashes reporting time and increases productivity with Microsoft Teams and Power Apps
executive_summary: Air Astana is the flag carrier of Kazakhstan and operates both domestic and international services across 64 routes in Eurasia. The company strives for the highest safety and customer service standards for both external and internal processes. To obtain timely financial reports, the company leveraged the power of Microsoft Azure Synapse Analytics together with Microsoft Power BI. Now, reports are generated within seconds instead of hours, boosting the team’s productivity and efficiency.
products: Azure, Azure Synapse Analytics, Power BI

title: Jane Goodall Institute uses AI to unlock research potential with MediaValet and Azure
executive_summary: For more than six decades, Dr. Jane Goodall and her research team have studied chimpanzees. In 1977, she founded the Jane Goodall Institute (JGI) to help understand and protect chimps and work with local people to restore and protect the shared environment around them. Digitizing field research materials took a lot of manual effort and time. In December 2020, JGI started collaborating with Microsoft and Microsoft Partner Network member MediaValet to aggregate, connect, and preserve multiple data sets spanning six decades of research. Now, JGI uses AI and MediaValet to automatically tag assets with specific metadata and make assets widely available to researchers.
products: Azure

title: Microsoft soars ahead, gaining an 18-fold performance increase with Azure Sentinel
executive_summary: Microsoft constantly evaluates and updates its security posture. In 2016, it began a quest for a security information and event management (SIEM) system that would handle the security challenges it was likely to face four years into the future. Fast forward to June of 2021, when the company’s Digital Security and Resilience team went live with Microsoft Azure Sentinel, created for the cloud. Just two months after deployment, the team is achieving impressive gains: an 18-fold performance increase for data ingestion. Microsoft customers who depend on the software giant for cutting-edge solutions can enjoy the same advantages with cloud-native Azure Sentinel.
products: Microsoft Sentinel

title: ChemTreat digitally transforms its manufacturing and service operations with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: ChemTreat, Inc. (ChemTreat) provides water and process treatment services to a wide range of industries. To keep pace with its own growth and increasing technological maturity in the markets it serves, ChemTreat adopted Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management and Dynamics 365 Finance, using them to improve its processes, transform its operations, and modernize its supply chain management. With expert implementation support from partner Alithya and the FastTrack for Dynamics 365 team, ChemTreat realized enhanced data visibility and insights, improved inventory, manufacturing, and distribution processes, and now provides better, more intentional, and proactive customer service.
products: Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI

title: An AI view of the construction site: GOLDBECK and HoloBuilder detect defects using automated documentation with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: It is almost impossible to manage a construction site without being physically present. All kinds of tasks and trades have to be coordinated, controlled, and documented. A demanding job, where carelessness and corrective measures can eat into resources and delay completion. This is why GOLDBECK employs the solution provided by German-American start-up HoloBuilder, which combines 360° images with artificial intelligence to document and analyze construction progress. In 2020, Roland Berger and Microsoft honored GOLDBECK and HoloBuilder with the Intelligent Manufacturing Award for the solution.
products: Azure

title: Popular outdoor retailer REI embraces hybrid work with Microsoft Teams and Surface Hub, supporting its sustainability goals
executive_summary: “Connect every person to the power of the outdoors and engage in the fight to protect it.” That mission may seem ambitious, but not for REI Co-op. The largest consumer cooperative in the United States specializes in camping gear, outdoor apparel, and equipment and boasts 20 million members and 15,000 employees who believe deeply in its mission. “We want to be inclusive and welcome everybody into the outdoors,” says Chris Grey, Director of Engineering, Infrastructure and Cloud Services at REI. “That’s one of the pillars of REI’s culture.”
products: Bookings, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Teams Rooms, OneDrive for Business, Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager, Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Teams Phone, Microsoft Viva Insights, Outlook, Surface Hub

title: Cerner associates shape the future of healthcare in hybrid workplaces with Microsoft collaboration tools
executive_summary: After extensive conversations with leaders across Cerner, the organization came up with three hybrid work categories that would likely play out across the company. All of these are augmented by Teams functioning as a collaborative hub for work. Using Teams, Higginbotham includes globally dispersed team members in these meetings, creating a sense of camaraderie despite the distance.
products: Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Teams Rooms, SharePoint Online, Microsoft Viva Engage, Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager, Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Viva, Microsoft Viva Insights

title: The technology behind dinosaurs, wild animals, and Horse Club: Strategic digitalization at Schleich based on Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Schleich’s highly detailed and authentic-looking creatures light up every child’s eyes. The toys made by this long-established company, which was founded in Schwäbisch Gmünd in southwest Germany, have been fueling people’s imagination since 1935. Today, Schleich sells its products in over 70 countries and operates locations all around the globe. To support the internationalization of its business with the right IT infrastructure, the company migrated its fragmented on-premises solution to the Azure cloud platform. The modern workplace ensures collaboration across national borders that is scalable, flexible, and has a firm focus on data security.
products: Azure, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps, Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Intune, Power Automate, Power BI, Surface Hub

title: Romania’s Patria Bank enables business resilience with Microsoft 365 tools
executive_summary: Patria Bank provides banking services to micro and small business clients as well as to the retail and agribusiness sectors in Romania. Committed to high-touch banking, it always strives to drive meaningful connections with its clients, employees, and partners. To enhance internal connections, the bank rolled out Microsoft 365 tools—namely Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive. Now, with streamlined communication channels, more than 700 employees across 30 cities are empowered to run leaner operations, accelerating delivery of fast, reliable, and more resilient services.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, OneDrive for Business, SharePoint Online

title: Green Roads positions its CBD business for hyper-growth with Microsoft Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Green Roads is a leading manufacturer and distributor of hemp-derived cannabidiol (CBD) products. As a leader in a $5 billion industry that is growing significantly, Green Roads needed a technology solution that could support rapid expansion. The company needed to consolidate its siloed, small-business software solutions into a single enterprise resource planning (ERP) system that would help its growing company stay on top of the changing regulatory landscape, predict demand requirements, and prioritize the mixed-mode manufacturing environment. Working with Alithya, a member of the Microsoft Partner Network, Green Roads deployed Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations.
products: Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

title: illumiSonics is working to accelerate real-time, touchless laser research geared to revolutionizing medical imaging with Azure
executive_summary: illumiSonics is a newly founded but quickly growing medical technology company dedicated to developing the Photoacoustic Remote Sensing (PARS) imaging system for a variety of preclinical and clinical applications. While attempting to source a powerful, GPU-powered server for its research projects, the company realized that no amount of onsite hardware would fit its rapidly scaling needs. Instead, illumiSonics adopted Microsoft Azure. Leveraging the Research Center of Excellence on Cloud, the company expects to accelerate its research outcomes, potentially revolutionizing histopathology and ophthalmology, and bringing more precise diagnostics and surgeries to patients and healthcare professionals.
products: Azure, Azure AI Services, Azure Machine Learning

title: Microsoft Azure helps business harness the power of AI for social impact
executive_summary: The partnership of Social Tech Trust and Microsoft for Startups seeks to realise some of the opportunities presented by using AI to solve some of the world’s biggest challenges. Kathy Marcham, Portfolio Manager Social Tech Trust, explains: “We created a programme that enables these purposeful founders to not only create world-class technology but to also develop their commercial skills and their social business acumen.”
products: Azure

title: Cycle Agarbatti automates HR tasks, boosts employee efficiency by 40% with factoHR on Azure cloud
executive_summary: Cycle Agarbatti, the largest manufacturer of incense sticks in the world, needed a modern HR solution to keep up with its evolving business and technological needs. By adopting the cloud-based modern workplace solution by factoHR using Microsoft Azure, Cycle Agarbatti improved its employee efficiency and productivity by 40 percent. The mobile-driven, plug-and-play features of factoHR combined with Azure platform capabilities helped the fragrance creator streamline and automate its weekly payroll process and track attendance and business expenses along with other recurring office tasks. This paved the way for Cycle Agarbatti to continue to live up to its commitment to employees and customers and honor the legacy of three generations.
products: Azure

title: For Procter & Gamble, data is at the heart of digital transformation
executive_summary: For more than 180 years, Procter & Gamble (P&G) has built a thriving business by challenging norms and delighting consumers. Its range of household products, from toothpaste and soap to paper towels and laundry detergent, can be found in millions of homes—in nearly every country on Earth.
products: Azure, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Synapse Analytics, Power BI

title: Metrie increases customer response times, overall agility with SAP on Azure
executive_summary: Metrie, a leading manufacturer and distributor of interior finishings for North America, needed to expand the capabilities of its SAP infrastructure. The problem was, the company’s existing cloud provider couldn’t cope with the new demand. Working with Qnovate, Metrie moved its SAP estate—core to almost every element of the business—to Microsoft Azure. The move not only granted the scalability required for future functionalities, but it gave the company back the control and security over its operations that aging cloud infrastructure had begun to erode.
products: Azure, Azure Site Recovery, SAP on Azure

title: Saint Peter’s Healthcare System modernizes processes to better fulfill its mission with Microsoft Teams and Surface
executive_summary: Saint Peter’s Healthcare System struggled with the cost and complexity of using many different tools and platforms, as well as the inefficiency of manual, time-consuming processes. Fortunately, a strong, mission-based culture has helped IT leaders at Saint Peter’s focus on digital transformation that empowers employees and improves patient outcomes. As a result, they have improved collaboration with Teams and started a pilot program with Surface that brings a fresh approach to making clinical rounds. They will also be working closely with Microsoft as they look to the future and explore how Azure can help streamline their infrastructure in the search for new ways to achieve their mission.
products: Azure, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, OneDrive for Business, Microsoft Intune, SharePoint

title: AxFina finds speed and regulation with Azure migration
executive_summary: When central and eastern Europe focused asset and loan servicer AxFina Holding SA acquired Hungarian leasing company Lombard Lízing Zrt., it had just a few weeks to replace Lombard’s infrastructure, which had reached the end of its life cycle. With AxFina’s desire to innovate and scale and regulatory requirements looming, it turned to Hungarian IT company DIGITAL Kft. to help AxFina migrate the entirety of its IT applications to the cloud. Microsoft Azure became the ideal solution to help ensure that AxFina maintained security, regulatory compliance, and speed.
products: Azure, Azure Lighthouse, Azure Policy, Azure Virtual Desktop, Exchange Online

title: Rabobank grows a safer global IT landscape with Microsoft Security solutions
executive_summary: With agricultural and food industry clients around the world, Rabobank has a widespread IT estate to protect. The bank’s mission of “Growing a better world together” hinges on a blend of innovation and strong ethical principles. For the Rabobank Cyber Defense Center, that means securing a vast and disparate hybrid, multicloud environment. Not content to merely keep up, Rabobank rolled out Microsoft Security solutions to implement proactive, effective security and compliance—all while optimizing cost and security team productivity.
products: Azure AI Bot Service, Microsoft Teams, Power Automate, SharePoint

title: Customer engagement enhanced with cloud-based analytics and AI
executive_summary: 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. helps customers express, connect and celebrate with the help of SAS® Viya® on Azure. Personalized marketing helps the e-commerce retailer provide an exceptional customer experience, building meaningful connections with 14 million customers (as of 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. Fiscal Year 2021).
products: Azure

title: The Association of Waterworks in Denmark creates a safe hybrid workplace with iGlobe's Office2SharePoint for Outlook and Microsoft 365
executive_summary: Most waterworks in Denmark are organized as cooperatives. Danske Vandværker (DVV) is the Association of Waterworks in Denmark, and its members deliver 40 percent of the total amount of water abstraction across Denmark. DVV’s purpose is to promote the views and interests of water cooperatives to the public, the authorities, and the politicians.
products: Microsoft 365

title: Azure helps Avanade build retail solutions to change the world
executive_summary: Learn how the Avanade Intelligent Store framework, built on Microsoft Azure, brings added value to store employees and allows stores to better engage with their customers—all while delivering the retail experiences that customers want.
products: Azure

title: Elkjøp creates a superior customer experience with Azure Kubernetes Service
executive_summary: As the biggest electronics retailer in the Nordics, Elkjøp has never had trouble attracting customers into its stores. But with so much focus on the shop floor, Elkjøp’s IT systems had been left in the dark, using outdated e-commerce and point of sale (POS) platforms that hadn’t been upgraded for the future. The Next Generation Retail project aimed to change all that, with an overhaul of every Elkjøp system to modernize functionality and move all its core business into the cloud—a revolutionary shift for this retailer that also helped it navigate the social-distancing challenges of 2020.
products: Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Kubernetes Service, Microsoft Teams

title: Lessons learned from using Microsoft Viva during the pandemic to improve employee work-life balance
executive_summary: After a two-year period of remote work, many Microsoft employees are returning to their offices—but not to the old ways of working. During that disruptive time, Microsoft leadership, reinforcing a culture that emphasizes employee wellbeing, listened to employees and learned many lessons about work-life balance and wellbeing. Teams then worked together to implement change by enforcing positive habits with Microsoft Viva. These best practices, which flourished during the pandemic, will help Microsoft maintain its business success moving forward in a hybrid work environment.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Viva, Microsoft Viva Insights

title: VuNet Systems leverages Azure to provide observability and AI-driven insights to customers
executive_summary: VuNet Systems (VuNet) has an integrated platform which uniquely combines Big Data, Domain-Centric ML Models and MLOps to accelerate digital transformation at organizations. Its AI-led business observability platform vuSmartMaps™, connects business, operations, and user experience at scale through an intelligent unified view of business journeys for digital enterprises.
products: Azure, Azure Blob Storage, Azure Data Factory

title: Digital Transformation at Computer History Museum creating a critical foundation for continued growth and unforgettable visitor experiences.
executive_summary: Computer History Museum makes their unprecedented collection and unique perspectives accessible to visitors of all ages, backgrounds and interests through comprehensive exhibits, interactive learning experiences, dynamic programming, and original media productions. The Museum’s Digital Transformation journey helped them take important steps to enable the technology vision today and create a strong foundation for a bigger and bolder future.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Office 365, Microsoft 365 E5

title: Bancolombia protects 23,000 devices in a highly secure environment using BitLocker
executive_summary: In early 2020, the bank wanted to update its device encryption practices to improve general device security and more easily comply with government regulations regarding encryption. Bancolombia needed to ensure its 23,000 bank-issued devices were encrypted, and ultimately chose Microsoft BitLocker as the best solution for its encryption needs. As a data protection feature, BitLocker Drive Encryption helps safeguard devices’ operating systems and provide better management for lost or stolen devices.
products: Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager, Microsoft Intune

title: Aecon modernizes collaboration by migrating to Microsoft Teams with VNEXT iQ’s help
executive_summary: Aecon, a Canadian leader in construction and infrastructure development, had an on-premises Skype for Business environment and wanted to migrate to Microsoft Teams. Microsoft partner VNEXT iQ, a professional services and managed services provider, assisted Aecon with the project and set up audio conferencing, auto attendants, and call queues. VNEXT iQ and Aecon then collaborated on change management and adoption activities that were critical to the transformation and modernization path. Now Aecon uses Microsoft Teams as a remote-work tool and has been utilizing Teams app templates for company communications and documentation.
products: Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Teams Phone

title: Fraser Health boosts post-pandemic health services with holistic communications solution
executive_summary: Fraser Health was already on a digital transformation journey as staff and patients alike adapted to changing work and life circumstances, accelerated by the pandemic. The organization’s Collaboration & eHealth Services team was tasked with providing the latest tools and services to best support office, frontline, and patient services with particular emphasis on the new demands and opportunities introduced by a shift from in-person to virtual care. Fraser Health partnered with Microsoft Gold Certified Partner Calian to introduce new solutions, such as Microsoft Teams, which serves as a hub for enhanced patient communications, scheduling, data exchange, and physician collaboration.
products: Azure, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Intune, Power Apps

title: Engagement hinges on communication: Blum empowers frontline workers with employee experience app
executive_summary: Blum already had licenses for Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Teams, which were primarily used by office workers. Wanting to support its entire workforce, the company evaluated options for an employee experience platform and decided to adopt Microsoft Viva. With Viva Connections easily accessible via mobile devices as well as computers, Blum’s frontline workers use it on the factory floor for a wide variety of information and communication, such as messaging colleagues, reserving time off, reviewing paystubs, and ordering snacks for breaks.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Viva, Microsoft Viva Connections

title: University of Miami gains flexibility, disaster recovery resiliency with Azure VMware Solution
executive_summary: Founded in 1925 in South Florida, the University of Miami is a private research university with more than 17,000 students. To fortify its disaster recovery strategies, the university’s IT team turned to Microsoft Azure for a cloud-based approach for its key systems. Also faced with a looming hardware renewal for its remaining colocation centers, the school decided to deploy Microsoft Azure VMware Solution. As a result, the university realized six-figure cost savings, averted months of purchase order processing and supply chain delays, and it gained agility during the COVID-19 crisis.
products: Azure, Azure VMware Solution

title: Self-managing health and wellness with IN.S.P.I.RE., Pegasus One, and Azure
executive_summary: IN.S.P.I.RE. Global LLC wanted to create a health and wellness self-management platform. After exploring various options for back-end and AI tools from other vendors, the IN.S.P.I.RE. team turned to Pegasus One for help. Because the business was in an early startup phase, the partnership was critical to its success. The most challenging aspect of the work was supporting the transformation of an idea into a working platform quickly and affordably. Microsoft Azure services formed the core of the design, Azure Cognitive Services provided user engagement capabilities, and Azure Security Center was employed for critical security. Together, IN.S.P.I.RE. and Pegasus One built and launched the Vertie Total Health solution.
products: Azure, Azure API Management

title: Corporate social responsibility for retail: A new spending habit
executive_summary: The Country of Curaçao is tackling its economic losses from the loss of tourism due to the COVID-19 pandemic by adopting the Azure-backed CSR plug-in. The integration of this CSR plug-in enables customer-directed merchant donations from Curaçao’s Caribbean shopping portal – www.tropicshopping.com. The Ministry of Economic Development of Curaçao sees this democratization of philanthropy as a critical element of its strategy to support local communities across the Caribbean as a core solution to address declines in revenue from tourism.
customer: Curaçao Industrial and International Trade Development Company (Curinde)
products: Azure

title: Coca-Cola subsidiary, fairlife, implements Power BI and Azure solution to democratize data across the brand
executive_summary: Founded in 2012, fairlife is a dairy company focused on creating better-for-you products through the power of dairy nutrition. Originally owned by a co-op of dairy farmers, fairlife has grown and launched numerous products and is now owned by the Coca-Cola Company. fairlife strives to make products that are better for people, animals, and the planet—and is harnessing the power of data to achieve that mission.
products: Azure, Power BI

title: Connecting content and expertise at a people-centric company: Viva Topics simplifies knowledge sharing at Avanade
executive_summary: As requests for innovative digital workplace solutions surged, Avanade employees wanted a solution that eliminated the need for extensive email threads or cumbersome searches and aligned with their “Teams as the experience platform” approach. Unlike most organizations where new technologies are gradually rolled out from one department to another, Avanade chose to offer Viva Topics to the entire company, enabling all employees to contribute to the curation around topics. With Viva Topics, employees can do that. Rather than broadcasting pleas for help on a Yammer site or initiating a chain of experts through Outlook, employees can search in SharePoint or see topics they’re interested in highlighted on the SharePoint page they’re already viewing.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Viva, Microsoft Viva Topics, Microsoft Teams, Outlook

title: Wellness Forever cuts time to data availability from days to minutes leveraging Azure services
executive_summary: Established in 2008, Wellness Forever Medicare Limited (Wellness Forever) is a retail pharmacy chain with more than 300 stores across Maharashtra, Goa and Karnataka, employing 4,500 people. The business is currently making strides in the omnichannel space.
products: Azure, Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Power BI

title: Swapping carbon paper for tablets: Shredding expert WEIMA restructures its global processes with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: WEIMA’s industrial shredders are used by companies worldwide to break down and compress huge quantities of plastic, wood, paper, and metal—helping preserve the environment. Because a resource-efficient value chain doesn’t stop at waste management. The family-owned company, based in Baden-Württemberg, has set itself the goal of making machines that mark the start of a sustainable, global recycling process. Determined to remain competitive in the future, too, WEIMA has restructured its digital processes. Using Microsoft Dynamics 365 as its global, cloud-based CRM system, the company is harmonizing and improving its processes in the areas of customer service, field work, and sales.
products: Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Dynamics 365 Field Service, Dynamics 365 Sales, Microsoft 365, Outlook, Power Automate, SharePoint

title: Manufacturing group Dextra revamps customer relationships with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Dextra is a global leader in the construction and industrial infrastructure and development supply sector working with multiple construction conglomerates. With 14 offices around the globe, the company needed a cohesive system for customer management. Dextra upgraded to Dynamics 365, merging all customer data into a single source. Since deployment, there has been a significant reduction in costs and an increase in salespeople efficiency.
products: Azure, Dynamics 365 Sales, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps, SharePoint

title: Anglian Water creates the workplace of the future with Microsoft Surface
executive_summary: Anglian Water is a water company operating in the East of England. It serves more than six million customers with water and sewerage services. Like many businesses, it rapidly transitioned many office-based staff to working from home in response to COVID-19. Within two weeks, NTT DATA Business Solutions Türkiye used Microsoft Power Apps to create an internal fundraising platform, OneHeart Solidarity, for the benefit of their affected employees and their families. Around 40 percent of employees donated, raising more than €100,000 for their colleagues and families.

By moving its orchestration and operation of remote condition monitoring applications to Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) Edge Essentials, ABB has a single end-to-end Kubernetes solution that helps unify edge and cloud assets to streamline application development and simplify deployment and management. As a result, ABB only needs to create one version of applications that can run on Windows, Linux, and in the cloud. This significantly reduces development and deployment time and frees resources to create even more effective AI-driven data analysis solutions from all the rich data collected from large manufacturing operations. Reduced administration requirements also allow ABB to handle a rapidly expanding edge ecosystem with a shrinking number of available workers.
products: Azure, Azure Kubernetes Service Edge Essentials

Just four months after deployment, team members experienced convenience like never before, and DPE cut licensing costs and raised IT team productivity. Most importantly, the company keeps morale high through its nontraditional inclusion of frontline workers in its corporate information workspace, Microsoft Viva. Now with Microsoft Entra ID, everyone is in the know with seamless and safer access.

title: Driving change to ensure user acceptance of new technology
executive_summary: Husky Injection Molding Systems, which provides equipment and services to plastics manufacturers worldwide, has 4,000 employees and operates across more than 100 countries from its headquarters in Ontario, Canada. The company’s previous ERP system had grown highly customized, making modifications difficult and costly. After evaluating its options, the firm chose Microsoft Dynamics AX as a replacement. During initial project discussions, Microsoft Enterprise Services introduced the concept of Adoption and Change Management as a disciplined approach to accelerate employee acceptance of the new ERP system. Microsoft experts worked with key team members driving the Husky initiative—called “Unite”—to get the organization ready for the coming changes and then to help employees manage those changes after the new ERP system’s debut. With guidance from Microsoft Adoption Services consultants, Husky’s change management efforts increased user acceptance of the new system, ensuring an easier, faster transition. Husky also developed a change management platform—including processes and team members—for use in its other digital transformation initiatives to help ensure their success, too.

title: Process automation company keeps complex landscape safe with Microsoft Azure Sentinel
executive_summary: When a leading robotic process automation (RPA) software company like UiPath takes stock of its security landscape, there’s a lot to consider. With multiple clouds and a sizable on-premises estate to protect, the company needed a solution that would address its complex needs. It chose Microsoft Azure Sentinel and the full suite of Microsoft security solutions. Security is tighter—and easier—than it’s ever been.
products: Azure, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Defender for Identity, Microsoft Defender XDR, Microsoft Sentinel

title: Blue Yonder combines Exasol with Azure and Power BI to deliver retail analytics on billions of records daily
executive_summary: Blue Yonder modernizes the biggest retail supply chains in the world using the cloud, artificial intelligence, and machine learning. With more than 1 billion sales forecasts generated daily, Blue Yonder chose Exasol as its high-performance analytics database, running on Microsoft Azure, refreshing Microsoft Power BI dashboards every minute. Exasol’s analytics database, using Microsoft Power BI for visualization, enables Blue Yonder to provide predictive forecasting capabilities, resulting in maximum supply chain efficiency. With this combined solution, Blue Yonder’s customers determine the optimal stored quantity of products, ensuring shelves are filled and logistic costs are reduced.
products: Azure, Power BI, Analytics Platform System

title: Chobani grows a culture of innovation, fast business development by moving to SAP on Azure
executive_summary: Food maker Chobani grew quickly and needed an IT environment that could keep up with future growth and changes. The company chose to implement SAP S/4HANA and other SAP applications on Microsoft Azure. With assistance from its current support partner Khoj Information Technology, Chobani continues to enhance a high-availability environment using the latest technologies like SUSE Pacemaker Clusters and Azure Site Recovery. The company now has a unified environment, better uptime, and instant scaling—all which will help the company operate more smoothly and analyze data to make fast, innovative business decisions.
products: Azure, Azure ExpressRoute, Azure Load Balancer, Azure Site Recovery, SAP on Azure

title: Bahrain’s Gulf Air Group saves 20% on licensing costs and boosts security with Microsoft 365 E5
executive_summary: Gulf Air Group faced the challenge of unifying its subsidiaries under a single digital foundation while striving to enhance customer experience, revenue growth, and boost operational efficiency.
products: Microsoft 365 E5, Power BI, Microsoft Entra ID, SharePoint Online, Azure, Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Teams, Azure Virtual Desktop, Microsoft Fabric

title: Arla Foods uses Azure OpenAI Service to help its staff create recipe collections
executive_summary: Arla Sweden was looking for ways to ensure that its online database of nearly 6,500 food recipes continued to be relevant to the tastes of its audience—ultimately attracting more traffic and delivering relevant content.

title: Retailer Sonae accelerates productivity and streamlines HR processes with Power Automate
executive_summary: Sonae is a multinational corporation headquartered in Porto, Portugal, with a diversified portfolio of companies spanning 62 countries. In a continuous focus on “improving life,” Sonae brands and companies are always looking to innovate, increase sustainability, and have a greater impact on a wider population. Sonae is leveraging Microsoft Power Automate as part of their digital transformation initiative to accelerate productivity, increase quality, and work-life enhancing solutions.
products: Microsoft 365, Excel, Power Apps, Power Automate, SharePoint

title: Surface HUB
executive_summary: In a hybrid setting, Surface Hub has given BEC Financial Technologies access to collaborate cross organization and countries in a new and motivational way. Get more information below, where BEC shares their story.
products: Surface Hub

executive_summary: The National Health Service (NHS) in the UK is using verified credentials to support swift staff movement between NHS organizations, allowing staff to store their own verified records for employment, clearance, and other attributes on their smartphones.
products: Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Entra Verified ID

title: The Miami Dolphins give fans the information they want when they want it with Power Virtual Agents
executive_summary: The Miami Dolphins, well known for football, also own Hard Rock Stadium, which hosts a wide range of sports and entertainment events. With so much going on, the Dolphins need to handle a high volume of requests for information about events and facilities. To free its service agents from repeatedly answering routine questions, the organization used Microsoft Power Virtual Agents to build a chatbot that’s now available at all times on its web properties. Multi-authoring capabilities make it easy for subject matter experts to update the bot themselves so that visitors always get current, accurate information. So far, the bot has handled more than 40,000 conversations and has successfully resolved 97 percent of them, leaving the remainder to service agents, who now have more time to focus on delivering exceptional service and increasing ticket sales.
products: Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Microsoft Copilot Studio, Power BI

title: Burckhardt Compression beefs up cybersecurity and efficiency with Microsoft 365 E5
executive_summary: Burckhardt Compression's fragmented IT security strategy was straining at its limits in the face of increasing threats and complex business requirements.
products: Microsoft 365 E5, Exchange, SharePoint, Microsoft Sentinel

title: Mid-Continent Instruments and Avionics boosts business continuity and prepares for the future with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: To strengthen business continuity for its operations and customers, Mid-Continent Instruments and Avionics moved its on-premises Microsoft Dynamics AX solution to the cloud with Microsoft Dynamics 365. The company can now engage customers in new ways, strengthen synergies among processes and tools, recover more rapidly from adverse events, and easily expand functionality to meet future needs. The success of the transformation depended on ease of use, along with familiar technologies and tools, and a long-time relationship with a trusted Microsoft partner.
products: Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management, Dynamics AX, Microsoft Teams

title: Korean biopharma company enters into the next phase with big tech
executive_summary: Korean biopharma company Celltrion is known for making the world’s first monoclonal antibody biosimilars, which are used as therapy for rare autoimmune diseases. The Fortune “Future 50" company has since expanded into global markets, forming distribution networks from strategic partnerships. The pharma giant’s global collaboration was accompanied by Microsoft 365 for efficient communication and data sharing. This led to advancing innovation while protecting highly-regulated biopharmaceutical industry data.
products: Azure, Azure SQL Database, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint

title: Malaysia’s Ministry of Education launches e-learning portal for 10,000 schools
executive_summary: Part of Malaysia’s Education Blueprint 2013-2025 focuses on information and communications technology which is key to scaling up learning. In collaboration with Microsoft and other providers, the Ministry of Education (MOE) launched the Digital Educational Learning Initiative Malaysia. The system is helping the MOE drive education forward, despite problems caused by the COVID 19 pandemic.
products: Microsoft Teams, Office 365

title: COMtrac and Azure help environmental agency meet goals
executive_summary: The Department of Agriculture, Water and Environment (AWE) administers the Environmental Protection and Biodiversity Conservation Act 1999. AWE enhances Australia’s agriculture, environment, heritage, and water resources, reduces impacts on the environment, and facilitates economic development. “The COMtrac system has provided my team/branch with a central point to store information and intelligence of all allegations on environmental compliance and has streamlined our assessment and investigation process,” said Garry Hall, Director of Investigations / Environmental Crime.
products: Azure

To facilitate the next chapter of growth and innovation for BlackRock and its Aladdin technology clients, BlackRock is moving its Aladdin investment platform to Microsoft Azure. With this migration, the company can deliver new products faster, help more people and companies in more geographies, and do more—outside of the constraints of an on-premises infrastructure.
products: Azure

executive_summary: To better predict customer buying behaviors and deliver best-in-class experiences, US-based Leatherman has focused on fostering personalized customer journeys through multiple touchpoints and purchasing channels. The iconic tool maker is now using Dynamics 365 Customer Insights to get a 360-degree view of its customers and generate intuitive, seamless customer experiences, all while using automation and AI to get the most out of its data. The company is seeing rapid growth in online sales and brand loyalty, creating excitement for the future of direct customer engagement.
products: Dynamics 365 Customer Insights

title: Franz Haniel migrates to Azure, protected by Microsoft Security solutions and cloud managed service provider glueckkanja-gab
executive_summary: Franz Haniel is a 100 percent family-owned company that has been headquartered in Duisburg, Germany, since its founding in 1756. With the help of Microsoft Intelligent Security Association (MISA) member and cloud managed service provider glueckkanja-gab, the company migrated its IT systems to the Microsoft Azure cloud, secured by the Microsoft Defender suite. Franz Haniel now enjoys reduced complexity and IT costs, a modern IT infrastructure, and a fully integrated, cutting-edge security suite managed by an experienced partner.

executive_summary: TMC Life Sciences Berhad’s use of Microsoft 365 brought much-needed integration to its group-wide operations. In creating a robust platform for staff and stakeholders to communicate and collaborate, the company also enlarged its ecosystem and gained newfound confidence through faster and more secure workflows. As it adopts SAP on Azure, TMC Life Sciences looks forward to the next leg in its journey towards becoming pan-Asia’s preferred healthcare system of choice.
products: Azure, SAP on Azure, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams

title: Microsoft Azure is the perfect fit for new HPC requirements at the University of Nottingham
executive_summary: Microsoft’s Azure Fast Track team have been fantastic. We were connected with specialist engineers who had expert knowledge, so we got answers very quickly on anything we needed to know,” says Adam Cox, IT Operations Engineer at the University of Nottingham. “I’d recommend any institution with a high-performance computing requirement speak with Microsoft’s Global Black Belts in HPC.
products: Azure

title: QAED, School Education Department, Government of Punjab, supports remote training and collaboration with Microsoft Teams
executive_summary: Quaid-e-Azam Academy for Educational Development (QAED), under the School Education department, Government of Punjab, is a premier ISO certified teacher training institution that takes the lead in implementing the Single National Curriculum for Primary to Higher secondary schools. Backed by the Government, the Pakistan-based organization empowers 368,000 private and public teachers with future skills, preparing them for the new framework via Microsoft Teams. The tool helps QAED train more teachers faster and differentiate classes, which has improved the quality of instruction while reducing on-site training expenditures.
customer: Quaid-e-Azam Academy for Educational Development (QAED), under the School Education department, Government of Punjab
products: Azure Red Hat OpenShift, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, OneDrive for Business

title: Ingredion aims to make the world a better place for all using powerful sustainability data
executive_summary: Ingredion provides plant-based ingredients to global industries ranging from food and beverages to pharmaceuticals. The company’s ambitious All Life 2030 sustainability plan targets emissions, plastics, energy sources, biodiversity, human rights, and more. To help achieve these goals, Ingredion sought a unified solution to replace the varied and highly manual data collection protocols in use at its dozens of global facilities. The company chose to work with Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability, and initial testing on its United States operations shows that Cloud for Sustainability can support Ingredion in making business decisions that help it meet its 2030 targets.
products: Microsoft Sustainability Manager

title: Chungbuk Technopark increases its support to small and medium enterprises with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Chungbuk Technopark (CBTP), a non-profit government organization in South Korea, assists in local business incubation by supporting small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). It proactively introduces and utilizes digital transformation technology to support the growth and development of local industries and companies. To provide companies in Chungbuk Province with new, trending services while addressing data sovereignty and latency, the technopark wanted to run various clusters in both on-premises data centers and public clouds. It moved to the Azure hybrid cloud and used Azure Arc to further secure and govern infrastructure and apps anywhere.
products: Azure, Azure Virtual Machines

executive_summary: Bridgestone is a global leader in tires and sustainable mobility solutions. A nearly century-old company with decades of experience in the automotive sector, Bridgestone is now looking at its future. Its EMIA Strategic Business Unit is currently undertaking a vast program of digital transformation aimed at improving operations, modernizing processes and improving its sustainability credentials. Crucial to this has been the creation of an end-to-end data platform – named CAPPA – that Bridgestone is using to gain key insights into its operations and make informed decisions on current and future strategies. All to become a leading provider of digital and sustainable mobility solutions in the world.
products: Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, Intelligent Data Platform, Microsoft Purview

title: Singapore’s national healthtech agency, IHiS, empowers patients to take ownership of their health with Health Discovery+ on Azure
executive_summary: National healthtech agency Integrated Health Information Systems (IHiS) faced challenges during the COVID-19 pandemic, driving them to accelerate its information technology (IT) initiatives to address Singaporeans’ growing needs. As a step to future-proof public health care, it developed and deployed its in-house system known as Health Discovery Plus (HD+), which runs on the Microsoft Azure platform. With the implementation, IHiS empowered more patients to take ownership of their health using HD+, which supports different vital signs monitoring programs across various settings such as polyclinics, hospitals, and senior activity centres.
products: Azure, Azure AI Bot Service, Azure Kubernetes Service

executive_summary: The South London Partnership (SLP) is a sub-regional collaboration of five London boroughs: Croydon, Kingston upon Thames, Merton, Richmond upon Thames and Sutton. With a combined population of 1.2 million people, the borough is home to 60,000 active businesses and supports 500,000 jobs.

title: Taiwanese Leading Fastener Company Creates New Momentum Through Digital Transformation
executive_summary: Anchor Fasteners was founded in 1986. Anchor Fasteners’ digital transformation enables to deliver high quality fasteners and helps reduce downtime. The company takes advantage of Microsoft Azure IoT, Dynamics 365, AI and various data services to increase the overall OEE by 15%, the machine utilization rate by 12%, shorten the downtime by 17%, and improve the production efficiency and yield to win more orders.

title: Porsche Cars North America delivers world-class service with Microsoft mixed reality and HoloLens 2
executive_summary: Porsche Cars North America (PCNA) is a brand built on dreams and the promise of product and service excellence. To help its dealer partners better maintain customers’ vehicles, PCNA is using Microsoft HoloLens 2 and Dynamics 365 Mixed Reality apps—Dynamics 365 Guides and Dynamics 365 Remote Assist—to revolutionize the service experience. With Guides, technicians can view a 3D hologram of a car and go through remote training classes without the cost and time required to travel to a distant training center multiple times a year. When technicians get stumped by a troublesome issue on the job, they can get guided 3D aid by using Teams on HoloLens to call an expert in another location. PCNA is excited about the ways these technologies will streamline vehicle service, enhance technicians’ work lives, and attract top new talent to the company.
products: Dynamics 365 Guides, Dynamics 365 Remote Assist

title: HELLENIC PETROLEUM Group digitally transforms with Azure to gain a competitive edge
executive_summary: HELLENIC PETROLEUM Group is a leading energy company based in Greece, with strong presence in Southeast European market. Aiming for a competitive advantage via digital evolution, it leverages rapid developments in new technologies in order to modernize its infrastructure, adopt innovative solutions and redefine its business processes.
products: Azure, Azure Virtual Desktop, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Power BI

title: University of North Carolina Greensboro migrates to Microsoft Azure to elevate student and community experiences
executive_summary: The University of North Carolina at Greensboro (UNCG) faced a decision between updating costly on-premises datacenters and investing in a more scalable alternative. UNCG leaders wanted to deliver better resources to students, faculty, and residents of the surrounding community and chose Microsoft Azure as its cloud technology. Through the campus-wide cloud migration and the launch of the Technology and Data Institute for the community, UNCG has become a model for what North Carolina academic institutions and communities can accomplish together through technology.
customer: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
products: Azure, Power BI, Surface Go, Azure Data Lake Analytics, Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Teams Phone

title: Canadian Tech Talent Accelerator project continues to create opportunities for Canada’s digital workforce
executive_summary: As organizations seek out best-in-class workers well versed in the latest tools and technologies driving global innovation, they’re finding those people don’t always exist. The disconnect between supply and demand for skills in the new digitally driven and fast-paced labour market has created a critical employability gap, but partnerships between the public and private sectors aim to solve this challenge. In the year since NPower Canada, Microsoft, Blueprint, and Digital Supercluster launched the Canadian Tech Talent Accelerator, more than 1,400 individuals looking to make a career transition or reenter the workforce have acquired the latest tech skills for today’s job market, with 80 percent finding full-time employment or moving on to continued learning opportunities. This project continues to ensure Canada’s digital workforce meets the needs of employers while opening doors for the next class of tech talent from all backgrounds.
products: Azure, Microsoft 365

title: Swedbank migrates big data platform to Azure Cloud for enhanced security and scalability
executive_summary: Swedbank is a multinational bank with a 200-year history. Recently, the company took the bold decision to migrate its big data platform to the cloud in search of greater scalability and security. With Azure Databricks functioning at the core of this solution, the successful migration has brought the bank a wealth of benefits. From reduced time-to-market and cost savings to significant improvements in its ability to detect fraud – it has set the bank and its 7.7 million customers on course for a more secure future.
products: Azure Cloud Services, Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Intelligent Data Platform

title: Reflecting on emotions and their impact on engaged learning: Lessons from The Stour Academy Trust
executive_summary: The Stour Academy Trust is a multi-academy trust at the forefront of providing a 21st century education for children, which services the county of Kent in Southeast England. Stour Academy educators look toward Kent’s future vis-à-vis their students. The staff and faculty in charge work diligently to create a new pedagogical model that focuses on student voice, choice, and collaboration. To help bring this vision to life Stour Academy has embraced Microsoft 365 A5, Microsoft Teams, and Microsoft Reflect, a check-in app to enhance social emotional learning and facilitate education for students across a variety of backgrounds.
products: Microsoft 365 A5, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Reflect, Windows 11

title: JLL gives sales teams a holistic view of client relationships with Microsoft Graph Data Connect
executive_summary: Fortune 500 commercial real estate leader Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated (JLL), uses Microsoft Graph to turn data into insight, improve business relationships, and accelerate prospecting. The company needed to efficiently identify brokers with strong, existing client relationships without slowing dealmaking or resorting to costly and time-consuming direct pulls of its Microsoft 365 data.  JLL decided to build a solution with Microsoft Graph Data Connect and Azure Data Factory.  JLL agents now have a handy customer relationship scoring utility that delivers, at-a-glance metrics about the relationships that their peers have built with each client or prospect.
products: Azure Synapse Analytics, Dynamics 365, Microsoft Graph Data Connect

executive_summary: Dutch construction company Heijmans is in a state of transition. To help meet national sustainability targets, the company is expanding its traditional approach towards becoming a digital service provider. With the support of longstanding partner Microsoft, it has used Azure Digital Twins and other Azure services to gain greater insights into existing infrastructure, such as traffic lights and bridges, and offer more efficient maintenance services. It is just the start, with plans to expand the use of data analytics services and digital twin and IoT technology to larger-scale projects, paving the way for a more sustainable future – to the great benefit of Dutch society.
products: Azure Digital Twins, Azure IoT Hub, Azure Stream Analytics

title: Bodibasixs optimizes production with Power BI, resulting in 25% revenue
executive_summary: Bodibasixs, a Malaysian manufacturing company of personal care and beauty products, is committed to customer satisfaction by providing innovative items and timely deliveries. Faced with data silos that hindered decision-making processes, Bodibasixs partnered with SRKK to implement Power BI for faster data collection and analytics. With different dashboards that provided reliable data quickly, Bodibasixs increased monthly revenue by 25 percent while optimizing labor costs and the size of its workforce.
products: Power BI

title: Accenture encourages a culture of innovation, empowering citizen developers with Power Platform
executive_summary: Accenture is a global professional services and consulting agency helping customers across 40 industries in more than 120 countries. Like many organizations, it had more demand than could be met by central IT, so Accenture decided to democratize and evangelize a low-code platform to empower citizen developers to solve their own problems. Recognizing the value that Power Platform had to offer, Accenture has continued to grow its Center of Excellence, and is offering all five Microsoft Power Platform products at scale. Now, Accenture sees significant savings each year with its new model, has more than 50k newly skilled citizen developers, and has reduced IT demand for short-term applications by 30 percent, giving professional developers the ability to focus on more complex projects.
products: Microsoft Viva Engage, Microsoft Copilot Studio, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages, Microsoft 365 Copilot

title: International CRO ClinChoice dramatically improves finance processes with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: ClinChoice is a global contract research organization (CRO) with prominent presences in China, the United States, Armenia, India, and over 20 other countries around the world. It provides clinical development services to biotech, pharmaceutical, and medical device companies. ClinChoice offers a wide spectrum of solutions for clinical development, biometrics, drug safety, medical affairs, regulatory consulting, and more. With an international client base, numerous contracts, and the complexities involved in any clinical research project, ClinChoice faced difficulties managing time, scope, and labor costs, as well as ensuring every project meets regulatory compliance in the countries it operates in. To help manage these challenges across the lifecycle of its projects, the company chose Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Dynamics 365 Project Operations to consolidate its ERP systems. With this new system, ClinChoice has a clearer picture of costs, regulatory requirements, and timelines, improving efficiency and coordination throughout their CRO projects.
products: Outlook, Power BI, Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Project Operations, Dynamics 365

title: Zabka Group launches autonomous Nano stores powered by AiFi and Microsoft Cloud for Retail, gains high customer ratings
executive_summary: As the largest modern convenience store chain in Poland, Żabka Group has made it its mission to understand and anticipate the needs of its customers—providing products and services that make their lives easier. Now, the company is launching Nano stores offering autonomous, frictionless, unmanned retail experiences designed to deliver the ultimate in convenience to customers. Using AI-powered real-time computer vision technology from AiFi to track customer behavior and product selection, and Microsoft Cloud for Retail to support data centralization, analysis, and solution scalability, Żabka is creating personalized customer journeys that are receiving high customer satisfaction ratings. In addition, Żabka is increasing operational efficiencies, gaining more foot traffic, and passing on cost savings to its customers.
products: Azure

title: Carlsberg improves digital employee experience to reach 29,000 employees using Microsoft VIVA
executive_summary: Since 1847, Danish brewing company Carlsberg Group has been serving customers with great tasting beer to accompany great experiences. But being a truly global organization has its own set of challenges, particularly when it comes to growing its employee base and global presence through internal communications and fostering a culture of inclusion. To overcome these obstacles and unite its workforce, Carlsberg built a custom centralised platform using Microsoft VIVA Connections integrated with Microsoft Teams. The new intranet, CarlsNet, has improved internal reach and engagement, becoming a useful tool to find news and resources at the desk or on the go. Most of all, CarlsNet has connected teams from across the organisation’s three regions, and in every company function helping Carlsberg on its mission to create a great digital employee experience.
products: Microsoft Teams, SharePoint Online, Microsoft Viva Connections, Microsoft Viva Insights

title: HPE transforms to cloud-native endpoint management with a rapid Intune migration
executive_summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) is a global edge-to-cloud server, storage, and networking equipment manufacturer and IT services company based in Houston, Texas. Its more than 62,000 employees and 25,000-plus contractors help businesses turn data into insights and actions with greater security. To enable and enhance these efforts as efficiently as possible, the company recently implemented an enterprise-wide solution that uses Microsoft Intune for Mobile Application Management without enrollment and Windows mobile device management. Using the fully cloud-based solution, deployed over 18 months, HPE has increased its agility and responsiveness, yielding significant advantages in its IT operations, cybersecurity, carbon footprint, and user satisfaction. These advantages include more than 60 percent less time spent in endpoint patch adoption and a 70 percent reduction in device setup time for newly hired employees.
products: Windows Hello, Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Intune, Windows Autopilot, Windows, Windows 11

title: Bayer employees discover productivity and collaboration benefits using generative AI and Microsoft Copilot
executive_summary: A leader in life sciences for 160 years, Bayer has more than 100,000 employees working toward its mission of “Health for all, hunger for none.” Bayer employees are using emerging technologies, including generative AI and Microsoft Copilot, to contribute to feeding a growing global population and helping people lead healthier, disease-free lives. After looking into the topic of generative AI at Bayer, more than 700 areas of application were collected, and that number is growing.
products: GitHub Copilot, Microsoft 365, Microsoft 365 Copilot

title: BT Group helps customers connect “for good” seamlessly and safely with Microsoft Entra ID
executive_summary: Global telecommunications company BT Group believes that When people connect, there’s no limit to the good they can do. It takes pride in providing excellent customer service that makes those connections as easy and secure as possible. BT Group also anticipates evolving from a traditional telco to what it calls a “tech-co” by providing access to a variety of new products and services, some of which may be from third parties as incremental revenue streams; including offering ID-as-a-Service to other platform providers. Crucial to that ambition is seamless authentication, but the previous registration experience entailed a frustratingly time-consuming process. Customers had to repeatedly input their information for every service they wanted to access. To close the gap between that experience and its vision, BT Group created its single authentication framework based on Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Security solutions, and Microsoft Azure technologies, building a new ID platform named for its primary consumer brand, EE ID. Just weeks after deployment, dramatically lower registration abandonment, more than 5 million customers on board, and the thwarting of nearly 100 thousand malicious attacks bear out the wisdom of that innovation.
products: Azure, Azure Front Door, Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Sentinel

title: Avanade puts people first, accelerates sales productivity with Microsoft Copilot for Sales
executive_summary: Avanade, a leading Microsoft solutions provider, soars on the strength of its accomplished consultants. The results it achieves for clients begin with highly trained sellers who keep Avanade’s project pipeline flowing. But as its client base and sales support technologies proliferate, the high-touch field of professional services selling is growing increasingly complex. Using the AI-infused Copilot for Sales and Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales, Avanade reduces workload for sellers with a range of time-saving features, helping them create and update contact records, summarize email threads, pull related data together, and improve email responsiveness. Even in the early stages of implementing Copilot for Sales, Avanade sellers are showing clients that they are top of mind while saving time and working more productively than ever before. The early adoption of Copilot for Sales is part of Avanade’s overall ambition and transformation to ready people, processes, and platforms and responsibly innovate and work with AI.
products: Dynamics 365 Sales, Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Dynamics 365, Microsoft 365 Copilot for Sales, Microsoft 365 Copilot

The company required a scalable and adaptable solution to solve industry-specific challenges. title: Solving global water challenges with Microsoft cloud technologies
executive_summary: We’ve been warned for decades to improve water management, and recent events such as the California drought are currently keeping the issue in the news. We take action at home by not watering our lawns and spending less time in the shower. But although personal conservation is a step forward, it’s only part of the solution. The morning cup of coffee after your three-minute shower took 55 gallons of water to produce. The shirt you’re wearing commanded another 700 gallons of water to create, and the car you drove to work required a staggering 39,090 gallons to build. Fortunately, Ecolab—a leading global provider of water, hygiene, and energy technologies and services—is on a mission to make changes that enable the goods and services we rely on every day to be produced and delivered with a lot less water.
products: Azure IoT Hub, Azure Internet of Things, Dynamics 365 Field Service, Dynamics 365 Sales, Office 365, Power BI

To accomplish this goal and increase the efficiency of IT staff, UPS recently completed two transformative projects. One initiative—a faster, consolidated version of the UPS Mobile app—has improved customer experience and nearly halves the amount of code, compared with the previous platform-specific versions. Developers quickly brought the app to market using Visual Studio Tools for Xamarin. The second initiative improves service levels via a chatbot called UPS Bot, which runs on the Microsoft Bot Framework and Azure. Customers can engage UPS Bot in text-based and voice-based conversations to get the information they need about shipments, rates, and UPS locations.

The company adopted Microsoft Azure Databricks and the Hyperscale service tier of Azure SQL Database to ingest, process, and analyze the data for 1 trillion transactions a year. To make training more efficient, repeatable, and effective, TMNA is using Microsoft Dynamics 365 Guides and Dynamics 365 Remote Assist on Microsoft HoloLens 2. Trainers can quickly and easily create, update, and deliver content to multiple trainees at the same time, and the company can track their progress to identify opportunities to optimize training. When real-time expert support is needed, team members can also quickly connect with a remote expert using Dynamics 365 Remote Assist, which enables 3D annotations right in their real-world work environment. Finally, TMNA took advantage of mixed reality layout capabilities to accurately plan the installation of new equipment on the busy factory floor.

executive_summary: Gerdau faced challenges in manually analyzing about 1,000 annual quotes from corporate clients, resulting in time-consuming and error-prone processes. The company turned to the Microsoft Azure AI solution to increase accuracy and efficiency.

title: Glidewell collaborates with Avantiico to increase sales order processing by 12% with the same workforce using Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Glidewell Dental (Glidewell) relied on multiple siloed systems for its operations, including paper-based and manual processes. A gap analysis showed the company needed a new ERP system and helped it identify the required features.

title: GIRA DENTAL brings innovation to Customer Engagement
executive_summary: GIRA DENTAL is the No. 1 company for managing dental clinic networks across Spain. It uses technological oral health management solutions to connect a network of clinics and their insurance company customers through a variety of web platforms. It has agreements with different insurance companies and organizations which enable it to provide oral health care to more than 6 million people. Nowadays, we need to be constantly developing, adapting, and testing new initiatives to attract new customers. We need to attract a constant flow of customers/patients, staying connected via all the latest channels that Internet users are adopting.

executive_summary: Almacenes Siderometalúrgicos SA (Alsimet) has been operating in the semi-finished steel, copper, brass, and aluminum metals distribution market for 75 years. Leaders in the distribution of metals.
